channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @Cbtree58 @BillWylie3rd @jayrosen_nyu @adlaiobie @adamdavidson It's not deafness. It's a clear business model: They can't afford to alienate their Republican advertisers, readers, and friends-of-owners. Certainly not when Democratic leadership keeps insisting that Republicans are "good" and should not be demonized.
@ShulimLeifer @HannahLebovits @zschrieber Which is why Chabad is often considered the most apeeling form of Judaism.
@atrubek Oooh. Did not see the wage or remote work possibility in earlier versions of this posting.

@1_Little_Goat @EladNehorai Really? Because I’m old enough to remember when Judaica Press published works advocating mitzvot as a path to an ethical lives, not hagiographies of convicted criminals who abused workers and animals.
@tromano @trekonomics Is it swotting if you tell the police dispatcher someone is holding an illegal object capable of mass destruction?
@Foone I have no knowledge of any secret life of my daughter with that name, but I have no doubt she could excel as a secret agent. Just want to put that out there.
@kampeas @Liz_Cheney @AIPAC @Jim_Jordan It's almost as if the Republican leadership is blackmailing AIPAC.....

AIPAC: Ensuring the Israel will have friends in an authoritarian, post-Constitutional America. https://t.co/FJMR9bPCwM
Conversely, if you don't think that radical coup-plotters like Mike Lee should be supported, you probably should not be supporting AIPAC. https://t.co/reEfRyG5w4
It does seem as if Republican leadership is blackmailing AIPAC into not supporting pro-Israel candidates who oppose Trumpism.
https://t.co/xekytudRZW
Which means that it is once again appropriate to ask the question of whether Republican leaders are being blackmailed, either by Russian hack of their accounts in 2016, or perhaps by McConnell's Chinese ties.
Some pre-Trump thoughts on the role of blackmail in the ongoing collapse of the American Republic by the always thoughtful, occasionally Hugo Award-winning, @DavidBrin https://t.co/tomAde4uBo
@prof_dainy Or maybe we should gift them another @BenYehudaPress title that will tackle their hashkafa head-on. https://t.co/fSU8A7gGhD

@DemocraticLuntz @onthemainline @PYMundGenealogy What was yesterday's Miller news?
@DemocraticLuntz @onthemainline @PYMundGenealogy Incidentally, if you want evidence that Miller is not properly understood in too much of modern Orthodoxy, here's last week's column by our Teaneck suburban ortholife columnist: https://t.co/aUdpijKf4G
@EmExAstris @velveteenrabbi @crazywholelife @JewCantWalk @JasonLehn So they’re a placeholder on the way to the Platonic ideal Easter tribble.
@MisfitTorah And this is different than all other days of discourse how?
@LemieuxLGM Really surprised that the album didn’t register with me. Did Warren punch the grandma of a WFUV disc jockey or something?
@drvolts Remember that Wired cover story about breakthrough VR only a couple years back? Seems to have gone the way of its 1996 Smellovision cover story....
@Yeshivisha @BluegrassRabbi @18_forty They say it's good to be a Gerrer.... Different derech, still no gebrukst, if I understand correctly.

Your occasional reminder that The New Jersey Jewish Sports Hall of Fame was founded in 2019 to honor Jewish athletes and others in the world of sports who have distinguished themselves in and around New Jersey. https://t.co/BOICj052iW
@protecttruth_ @anatosaurus This is part of the problem with gerontocracy. None of the decision makers live in email -- so they don't see this as a problem.
@Haymarket_XWs @BenYehudaPress Yes it is.
@vpcalabrese @DemocraticLuntz Let’s not forget the Times’ decision *not* to dox Meir Kahane after his pregnant mistress died by suicide.
@yourfriendbird7 Go on….

@handdrawnsquare @doctorow @wgfranklin @greybunny @JohnBovril While I acknowledge the DDOS risk, the $100 I spent on “smart” bulbs for my apartment has been worthwhile so far. Being able to control 4 multi-bulb vertical lamps from one app can’t be beat. Evening incandescent mode is a bonus.
@dick_nixon Mr. Z: did the president ever learn to type, or has he always relied on secretaries?
